featured.text: Forced to quit school in fifth grade after his father died, Abate worked as a shoe-shine boy for years.
To help Abate continue running, the coach arranged a motel job for him, which pays $9 a month.
Take the case of Million Abate.

definition.en_def: to reduce in amount, degree, or intensity; to lessen
definition.example: The storm began to abate after several hours of heavy rain.
